game.name: Santa Airlines
game.description:
Hey! We are living in a 21st century where the most wanted personality Santa prefers distributing the gifts through a plane. This cute Santa has also decided to deliver presents through his most favourite modern plane named Santabus DEC25. But, the problem is that this is first time when he is going to handle this plane. Will you guide him to fly the plane perfectly? Join Santa Airlines and be prepared to assist Santa to navigate the skies with his lovely airplane!

Do not take it easily as you would have multiple things to do in this brand new adventure challenge. Grab gifts, boosters and also try to rescue as many kids as you can along the way! Do not forget to grab the power-ups and collectibles to make your game more interesting and challenging. Challenge your plane flying abilities to gather as many presents as you can before the big day! You will find flying a plane is an easy affair backed by the simple and easy controls of the game.

Feel free to play the tutorial if you have time to understand the full controls and the gameplay mechanics in this HTML5 flying game! Here you will get the tips and tricks how to control a plane right from your favourite Santa. Collection of a good number of boxes will help you to earn enough points to cash later! Do not forget to collect the flying children on the screen. Your game will finish when your time is over. Get ready to see your final score then! Find extra tricky and engaging puzzles in our other popular free Christmas theme games and spend some good time with elves and other characters!
